summary.para: Gets a collection of metadata, either for an entire presentation, or for one stream in the presentation.

param.name: pPresentationDescriptor
param.para: Pointer to the interface of the media source's presentation descriptor.

param.name: dwStreamIdentifier
param.para: If this parameter is zero, the method retrieves metadata that applies to the entire presentation. Otherwise, this parameter specifies a stream identifier, and the method retrieves metadata for that stream. To get the stream identifier for a stream, call .

param.name: ppMFMetadata
param.para: Receives a pointer to the interface. Use this interface to access the metadata. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: No metadata is available for the requested stream or presentation.

summary.para: Gets metadata from a media source or other object.

If a media source supports this interface, it must expose the interface as a service. To get a pointer to this interface from a media source, call . The service identifier is MF_METADATA_PROVIDER_SERVICE. Other types of object can expose this interface through QueryInterface.
Use this interface to get a pointer to the interface.
